items.title: A fireball erupts at the site of an Israeli airstrike in Beirut
items.description: A fireball erupts at the site of an Israeli airstrike Monday in Tayouneh in Beirut's southern suburbs

items.title: Residents embrace at the site of a rocket attack on Nov. 24, 2024 in Rinatya, Israel.
items.description: Residents embrace at the site of a rocket attack Sunday  in Rinatya, Israel.

items.title: Miriam al-Shami, whose husband and mother-in-law were killed, cries where her destroyed home once stood at the site of an Israeli airstrike in Beirut's Basta district  on Nov. 23 2024.
items.description: Miriam al-Shami, whose husband and mother-in-law were killed, cries where her destroyed home once stood at the site of an Israeli airstrike Saturday in Beirut's Basta district.

items.title: CUBA-ENERGY-BLACKOUT
items.description: A street is lit by car lights during the third night of a nationwide blackout in Havana on Oct. 20, 2024.

items.title: Cuba's energy grid suffered a complete blackout after Hurricane Rafael made landfall
items.description: Cuba's energy grid suffers a complete blackout after Hurricane Rafael made landfall in Artemisa province as a category three hurricane, in Havana, Cuba November 6, 2024

items.title: A vacationing couple brings a suitcase of medical supplies to a drop-off location in Cuba
